mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.id , sm.parent_id , sm.menu_name , sm.path , sm.component , sm.visible , sm.status , IFNULL(sm.perms, '') AS perms , sm.is_frame , sm.menu_type , sm.icon , sm.order_num , sm.create_time FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.menu_type IN ('C', 'M') AND sm.status = 0 AND sm.del_flag = 0;

SELECT DISTINCT sm.id , sm.parent_id , sm.menu_name , sm.path , sm.component , sm.visible , sm.status , IFNULL(sm.perms, '') AS perms , sm.is_frame , sm.menu_type , sm.icon , sm.order_num , sm.create_time FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON rm.menu_id = sm.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} AND sm.menu_type IN ('C', 'M') AND sm.status = 0 AND sm.del_flag = 0;
